title: The Stolen Award Trophy
setting: Pinnacle Advertising, lobby showcase, Wednesday 9 AM
premise: The agency's gold Addy Award trophy vanished from the locked lobby display case. It was last verified at Tuesday 5 PM closing and found missing Wednesday at 9 AM.

suspects.name: Brock Hartley
suspects.motive: Believes the trophy belongs on his desk since he led the winning campaign
suspects.alibi: I left the office at 5 PM and went to my son's basketball game at Lincoln Middle School. The game started at 5:30 and ended around 7 PM. Other parents saw me.

suspects.name: Mia Castillo
suspects.motive: Upset about being excluded from the award celebration despite booking the entire event
suspects.alibi: I left right at 5 PM and took the bus home. I was online shopping all evening. My browser history and delivery confirmations can prove I was on my laptop at home.

suspects.name: Philip Greer
suspects.motive: Took the award-winning photos but received no credit or bonus
suspects.alibi: I had a photo shoot at the office until 4 PM Tuesday. Then I packed up and went to develop photos at my home darkroom all evening. I live alone, so no witnesses.

suspects.name: Sandra Kim
suspects.motive: Has been taking small office items for months and escalating
suspects.alibi: I had dinner with a client at Marco's Bistro from 6 to 8 PM. Then I drove straight home. My client can vouch for me and I have the restaurant receipt.

clues.title: Display Case Key Log
clues.content: The display case key is kept in a lockbox at reception. The lockbox's electronic log shows it was opened at 4:50 PM Tuesday. Only reception staff know the lockbox code.

clues.title: Lobby Camera Gap
clues.content: The lobby security camera was repositioned Tuesday afternoon to film a client event. Between 4:30 and 5:15 PM, the display case was out of the camera's frame.

clues.title: Bus Route Timing
clues.content: Mia says she left at 5 PM and took the bus. But the Route 12 bus schedule shows the last bus from that stop departs at 4:45 PM on Tuesdays due to a reduced evening schedule.

hints.text: Look at the timing of each suspect's departure and how they left the building.
Does the claimed method of transportation actually match the available schedule for that day?
